about_the_game:
"550 hp with rear-wheel drive… This powerhouse concept car has become reality.
Inspired by the GT40, multiple winner of the 24 Hours of Le Mans, a limited edition of 4,038 units of the FORD GT was brought to market.

Its impressive features and sporty design make it an exceptional vehicle, perfectly adapted and ready for Extreme-Khana.
"
detailed_description:
"550 hp with rear-wheel drive… This powerhouse concept car has become reality.
Inspired by the GT40, multiple winner of the 24 Hours of Le Mans, a limited edition of 4,038 units of the FORD GT was brought to market.

Its impressive features and sporty design make it an exceptional vehicle, perfectly adapted and ready for Extreme-Khana.
"

Warning: This is a virtual game and not real life. Be cautious, do not imitate the vehicle movements shown in this game when you are driving a car in real life. Remember: drive safely!
name: V-Rally 4 - Ford GT 2006

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 7 64bits
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-540 or AMD Phenom II X4 940
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 560 or AMD Radeon HD 6870
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Soundcard
  • Additional Notes: 64bit Only
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3770 or AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 780 or AMD R9 290
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Soundcard
  • Additional Notes: 64bit Only

short_description: "550 hp with rear-wheel drive… This powerhouse concept car has become reality. Inspired by the GT40, multiple winner of the 24 Hours of Le Mans, a limited edition of 4,038 units of the FORD GT was brought to market.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian
